DOC.brief_title: Immune Function Muscle Adaptations Resistance Exercise Older Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : The study examine influence immune function old adult improvement muscle mass , strength , function resistance training . The maintenance benefit long term follow-up also examine . This objective accomplish double-blind randomized placebo-controlled trial nutritional supplement ( Muscle Armor ) evidence suggest improve immune function , promote muscle growth , counteract muscle loss . The study premise age result decreased ability immune system respond stimuli exercise . The study propose supplement improve muscle health promote shift immune function old adult pro-inflammatory state towards state support muscle growth maintenance . Research Plan : The study randomize Veterans ( age 60-80 , N=50 ) participate supplement placebo group three phase study . The phase participation correspond three specific aim . Aim 1 determine 2-weeks supplementation improve immune function . Humoral immune function assess response vaccination . Innate immune function measure systemic cellular response acute resistance exercise investigator ' previous study indicate affected aging . Aim 2 determine supplementation 36 session progressive high-intensity resistance training boost improvement muscle size ( CT scan ) , strength , function ( gait balance ) . Muscle adaptation cellular level also measure . Aim 3 determine continue supplementation 26-weeks completion exercise training promote retention gain muscle size , strength , function . Multivariable test use compare result Aims 1 , 2 , 3 determine whether immune function correlate muscle adaptation training detrain . Methods : Participants undergo nine blood draw five muscle biopsy vastus lateralis course study effect supplement immune function cellular adaptation training measure . Three blood draw use ass antibody response tetanus , pertussis , diphtheria vaccine . Muscle blood collect bout exercise conduct 2-weeks supplementation prior training . Immune function measure use blood base pro- anti-inflammatory cytokine level , balance specific T-cell subpopulation , proliferative capacity mononuclear cell . Immune function measure muscle base macrophage content specific cytokine growth factor . The investigator ' previous study show muscle measure strongly correlate size strength gain training . Key signal pathway include nuclear factor-k B PI3 kinase also measure . The fifth biopsy collect post-training measure adaptation cellular level base change number satellite cell myonuclei fiber size . Hypotheses related measure test 80 % power detect least 0.8 standard deviation difference mean supplement placebo group . Clinical Relevance : Exercise clearly able affect immune function . However , propose study attempt modulate immune function determine effect exercise outcomes . The study also examine detrain , important issue old adult , usually omit training study . Thus , study potentially advance understanding mechanism muscle gain loss older adult , importantly , study evaluate nutritional intervention complement exercise support muscle health age . Targeting immune system may advantage needed old Veteran successfully maintain restore muscle mass , strength , function necessary personal independence .
DOC.criteria: Veteran Age 6080 year Body Mass Index 18.5 29.9 kg/m2 Currently participate research study involve intervention Smokes tobacco product Tetanus TDAP vaccine previous two year Allergic vaccination Seizure past 3 month GuillainBarre Syndrome past 3 month Takes medication heparin , plavix / clopidogrel , coumadin / warfarin Allergic lidocaine Significant problem fainting Problems walk exercise leg Participated weightlift program target thigh last 3 month Pains , tightness pressure chest physical activity Metastatic cancer undergo chemotherapy Cerebral aneurysm intracranial bleed past year Endstage congestive heart failure ( NYHA Stage IV ) Unstable abdominal thoracic aortic aneurysm ( > 4cm ) Renal disease require dialysis Allergic vaccination Acute retinal hemorrhage ophthalmologic surgery past 3 month Bone fracture pelvis , leg , foot last 3 month Hernia cause pain physical activity Myocardial infarction cardiac surgery past 3 month Pulmonary embolism deep venous thrombosis past 3 month Proliferative diabetic retinopathy severe nonproliferative retinopathy Active suicidality suicidal ideation Systemic bacterial infection Taking aspirin form unable/unwilling discontinue least 10 day prior muscle biopsy Unwilling halt concurrent use amino acid protein supplement Unwilling halt new use nutritional supplement Unwilling maintain current normal diet Encephalopathy past 7 day Active oral genital herpes Current use appetite stimulant Current treatment mania bipolar disorder take lithium . Diagnosis significant cognitive deficit Untreated severe aortic stenosis Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus ( HbA1C > 10 ) Uncontrolled hypertension hypotension ( > 160/100 , < 100 systolic ) Uncontrolled malignant cardiac arrhythmia Unstable angina Allergic latex tape Bleeding clotting disorder Taking nonASA NSAID unable unwilling discontinue use 3 day prior muscle biopsy Taking Fish Oil , Gingko , Garlic , Saw Palmetto , Turmeric , Vitamin E unable unwilling discontinue use 10 day prior muscle biopsy procedure Significant problem chronic pain Uncontrolled asthma allergy Taking lactulose , nitrate plus hypertension medication Viagra Liver cirrhosis severe liver disease History peripheral artery disease Certain Steroid androgen use past 3 month Other physician judgment Significantly abnormal complete blood count ( CBC ) prothrombin time ( PT ) /partial thromboplastin time ( PTT ) /international normalize ratio ( INR )
